Ukraine's Zelenskiy hails arrival of new air defence systemsUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy welcomed the arrival on Friday of two new air defence systems that he said could "shoot down anything". Fri, 02 Feb 2024 22:05:52 GMT 7NSIV2UNKBJPVDCR3UBP3LBTUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-hails-arrival-new-air-defence-systems-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea tested firing cruise missiles on Feb 2 -KCNANorth Korea tested its cruise missiles as well as new land-to-air missiles off its west coast on Feb. 2, state media reported on Saturday, confirming a barrage of launches for weapons it said are aimed at enhancing defense capabilities. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:59:14 GMT BSVB3QK4BJITZD42K663SBKIHI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-tested-firing-cruise-missiles-feb-2-kcna-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Argentina lower chamber approves Milei's 'omnibus' reform billArgentina's lower chamber of deputies gave overall approval to libertarian President Javier Milei's sweeping "omnibus" reform bill in a vote on Friday after days of debate, paving the way for a decisive vote in the Senate. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:57:24 GMT R3PH4VRW3RP6DKNHTYP4632RYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-lower-chamber-approves-mileis-omnibus-reform-b​​ill-2024-02-02/Reuters世界美洲
Italy to supply admiral for EU Red Sea naval missionItaly will provide the admiral in command of a European Union Red Sea naval mission to protect ships from attacks by Yemen's Houthi militia, Defence Minister Guido Crosetto said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:53:15 GMT I3KFLTZ5XJKIFBM6JXJZWBXYIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-supply-admiral-eu-red-sea-naval-mission-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
US carries out retaliatory strikes in Iraq and Syria against Iran-linked targetsThe United States carried out retaliatory airstrikes on Friday in Iraq and Syria against more than 85 targets linked to Iran's Revolutionary Guard (IRGC) and the militias it backs, the U.S. military said, after a deadly attack in Jordan that killed three U.S. troops and injured some 40 others. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:17:32 GMT 2J6EYAJ2CRKHJFJV4AGZ22INUE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-starts-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-officials-2024-02-02/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界
Islamist rebels kill at least nine in eastern Congo attacks - armyIslamist rebels killed at least nine civilians in a string of attacks on Thursday and Friday in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, the army and local authorities said. Brazil's military reinforces border with Venezuela and Guyana due to EsequiboA convoy of military trucks and armored vehicles set off for Brazil's northern border on Friday to reinforce the presence of the Brazilian army in response to tensions over Venezuela's claim to Guyana's Esequibo region. Houthis say they fired ballistic missiles at Israel's EilatYemen's Iran-allied Houthi movement said on Friday it fired ballistic missiles at targets in the Israeli city of Eilat and threatened to keep up military operations until Israel ended its offensive in Gaza. Cuban president sacks economy minister as controversy grows over price hikesCuban president Miguel Díaz-Canel sacked economy minister Alejandro Gil on Friday, state media reported, as controversy continued to grow over the delay of recently announced measures to hike the price of fuel and transportation fares in the communist-run country. Chile's capital faces heat wave, experts warn of more to comeChile's capital and other regions are facing a heat wave, as meteorologists warn that extremely hot weather will become increasingly frequent in the country's austral summer. Canada considers sanctions on settlers in West Bank over violenceCanada is looking at imposing sanctions on "extremist" settlers in the West Bank, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Friday, a day after U.S. action against four Israeli men accused of being involved in violence in the occupied territory.
